name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth B. JOHNSON, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth B. JOHNSON, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Centre County Court of Common Pleas dated January 29, 1999. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the common pleas court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: J. Karen Arnold, District Attorney’s Office, for Com.
Joseph Amendola, State College, for Kenneth B. Johnson.
casebody.head_matter:
736 A.2d 600
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth B. JOHNSON, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 31, 1999.
Decided Sept. 23, 1999.
J. Karen Arnold, District Attorney’s Office, for Com.
Joseph Amendola, State College, for Kenneth B. Johnson.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
